silicate 0.1.6
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • silicate: the fabric of hierarchical structures
  • Changelog

Path decomposition

sc_path.Rd

Start in the middle, and build the 'path-link-vertex' table.

Paths.

sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for PATH
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for PATH0
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for ARC
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for SC
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for SC0
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for matrix
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for sf
sc_path(x, ids = NULL, ...)

# S3 method for sfc
sc_path(x, ids = NULL, ...)

# S3 method for MULTIPOLYGON
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for POLYGON
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for LINESTRING
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for MULTILINESTRING
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for POINT
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for MULTIPOINT
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for GEOMETRYCOLLECTION
sc_path(x, ...)

# S3 method for Spatial
sc_path(x, ids = NULL, ...)

Arguments

x

input object
...

arguments passed to methods
ids

object id, one for each object in the sfc

See also

sc_coord for the coordinates part of the model, sc_object for the features, and PATH for the full model.

Examples

sc_path(sfzoo$multipolygon)
#> # A tibble: 5 x 5
#>    nrow  ncol type         subobject path_ 
#>   <int> <int> <chr>            <int> <chr> 
#> 1     6     2 MULTIPOLYGON         1 gLFguT
#> 2     4     2 MULTIPOLYGON         1 4iuqS4
#> 3     5     2 MULTIPOLYGON         2 Ht7jwi
#> 4     5     2 MULTIPOLYGON         2 CA2U3r
#> 5     4     2 MULTIPOLYGON         3 dvAzRv
sc_path(sfzoo$polygon)
#> # A tibble: 2 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol type    path_ 
#>   <int> <int> <chr>   <chr> 
#> 1     6     2 POLYGON unwanB
#> 2     4     2 POLYGON 2iRvsb
sc_path(sfzoo$linestring)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol type       path_ 
#>   <int> <int> <chr>      <chr> 
#> 1     4     2 LINESTRING 4z6op4
sc_path(sfzoo$multilinestring)
#> # A tibble: 3 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol type            path_ 
#>   <int> <int> <chr>           <chr> 
#> 1     4     2 MULTILINESTRING H5hob5
#> 2     4     2 MULTILINESTRING 7a7iL4
#> 3     2     2 MULTILINESTRING 84IBSy
sc_path(sfzoo$point)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol type  path_ 
#>   <dbl> <dbl> <chr> <chr> 
#> 1     1     2 POINT zQLSG4
sc_path(sfzoo$multipoint)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol type       path_ 
#>   <int> <int> <chr>      <chr> 
#> 1     6     2 MULTIPOINT 7t0p4T
sc_path(sfzoo$multipoint)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>    nrow  ncol type       path_ 
#>   <int> <int> <chr>      <chr> 
#> 1     6     2 MULTIPOINT Uc3Pd1
